title: coingod1
author: coingod1
content: Are you  interested in learning about nfts and investing in the right one Well this is for youI have made  so much in crypto-trading than I can sayIn 2021 I minted  my first bored ape  for about 0.08eth bought few on opensea because i felt they were cute and undervalued .2022 January i sold all of my BAYC 100eth+  each when ethereum was still at 4k$ so i made a ton of dollars on my initial investment Nfts are quite tricky if you don’t get on the right one or invest smartly.With a minimum investment of 1500$ getting the right Nfts to invest on isn’t far fetched i will tell you the right NFT to buy and you would make at least  4times your initial costI could remember earlier last year i won a raffle to mint a moonbird NFT  for 2.5eth, well i sold it for over 40eth as it was a rare one i got.-Nfts are live changing if you get  on the right one and invest smartly.I would  love to guide and put anyone through so far there is  dedication and willingness to learn.I remember minting 150 goblintown nft with my mint bot as it was a free mint well i sold 20nfts to cover my initial cost and later on sold the remaining 130 at 0.9 and 1eth respectively.you can check opensea for all the nfts i mentioned-Joining the best alpha group also works well and it has also helped my trading journey as a holder of proof collective a community of whales in web3 you can’t go wrong with making money.-If you’re interested in investing in the right NFTS Send me a message on telegram(t .me/@Rahulisgood)

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: as many people should know99.99% of NFT are not worth what they are marketted atits simple as previous over priced marketted things:selling a UK 50p coin for £50 on ebay, where, emphasis: the seller and buyer are the same person. to set a fake over priced amount and fake demand. then find a sucker to pay similar price for something worth only 50pwhen you look at a NFT find a compatible real world example to price discover real valueEG a college guy doing street art cartoons using ink on canvas in tourist locations. where they draw unique pieces for each paying tourist (milkshake amount or restaurant 'meal for 2' sort of amount)that said NFT do have some real good functionality. for when NFT are used properly. but dont be blinded by the silly market prices silly people promote

comments.author: sbrys
comments.body: Quote from: coingod1 on January 27, 2023, 03:29:25 PMAre you  interested in learning about nfts and investing in the right one Well this is for youI have made  so much in crypto-trading than I can sayIn 2021 I minted  my first bored ape  for about 0.08eth bought few on opensea because i felt they were cute and undervalued .2022 January i sold all of my BAYC 100eth+  each when ethereum was still at 4k$ so i made a ton of dollars on my initial investment Nfts are quite tricky if you don’t get on the right one or invest smartly.With a minimum investment of 1500$ getting the right Nfts to invest on isn’t far fetched i will tell you the right NFT to buy and you would make at least  4times your initial costI could remember earlier last year i won a raffle to mint a moonbird NFT  for 2.5eth, well i sold it for over 40eth as it was a rare one i got.-Nfts are live changing if you get  on the right one and invest smartly.I would  love to guide and put anyone through so far there is  dedication and willingness to learn.I remember minting 150 goblintown nft with my mint bot as it was a free mint well i sold 20nfts to cover my initial cost and later on sold the remaining 130 at 0.9 and 1eth respectively.you can check opensea for all the nfts i mentioned-Joining the best alpha group also works well and it has also helped my trading journey as a holder of proof collective a community of whales in web3 you can’t go wrong with making money.-If you’re interested in investing in the right NFTS Send me a message on telegram(t .me/@Rahulisgood)Show some proof of your transactions or it didn't happen

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: he is just making a claim that NFT are worth $1500 minimum. to set peoples minds into thinking thats what they are worthone word:GREED

comments.author: sbrys
comments.body: Quote from: franky1 on January 27, 2023, 03:52:07 PMhe is just making a claim that NFT are worth $1500 minimum. to set peoples minds into thinking thats what they are worthone word:GREEDIndeed. And even quite badly executed

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: coingod1 on January 27, 2023, 03:29:25 PM-cut-i made a ton of dollars on my initial investment -cut-And we should just take your word that you sold everything at the top? And listen to investment advices from someone without ANY proof?Please show the transactions and prove they are your wallets and we can talk.Also most of the BAYCs and OG NFT holders hang around with others in twitter, so what's your twitter handle?You know i can make those claims too. In fact, without proof anyone can. You can also dm me your proof in twitter -> I am @nftcollector in there

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: coingod1 on January 27, 2023, 03:29:25 PMI have made  so much in crypto-trading than I can sayIn 2021 I minted  my first bored ape  for about 0.08eth bought few on opensea because i felt they were cute and undervalued .2022 January i sold all of my BAYC 100eth+  each when ethereum was still at 4k$ so i made a ton of dollars on my initial investment Bullshit, show us some blockchain evidence backing up your claims.Quote from: coingod1 on January 27, 2023, 03:29:25 PMSend me a message on telegram(t .me/@Rahulisgood)I bet anyone who contacts you will be asked to pay a fee for a "course about NFTs"So if you made that much money, then why are you looking for cents or a few dollars now?

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: sbrys on January 27, 2023, 03:40:13 PMQuote from: coingod1 on January 27, 2023, 03:29:25 PMIn 2021 I minted  my first bored ape  for about 0.08eth bought few on opensea because i felt they were cute and undervalued .2022 January i sold all of my BAYC 100eth+  each when ethereum was still at 4k$ so i made a ton of dollars on my initial investment Show some proof of your transactions or it didn't happen Indeed.  The beauty of public blockchains is that you can easily prove you are the great trader that you say you are.  Anyone can go out and make claims they minted a Bored Ape and now have the foresight to pick x10000 NFT collections to invest in.  Hell, maybe some people might even take your luck as you being some sort of sage in the space that can make them millions.  All you have to do is post the address and prove it's yours.  Very simple task for someone who was able to make so much money in web3.  I'm surprised someone with your experience would think that just making a claim is enough to inspire confidence.
